participant_1.name: Jovannie
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous. Enjoys meeting new people and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: My favorite show is Tom and Jerry. I live down the street from Miley Cyrus and PNB Rock. I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. I enjoy hanging out with my imaginary friends as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Chloe
participant_2.personality: Curious and creative. Loves to explore new places and make friends.
participant_2.background: I do not have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I am in 3rd grade. I am a French girl, but I moved to the US last year. I live with my parents and my little brother. I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix.

content.text: Hey, I'm Jovannie! What's your name?
I'm participant_2, what's yours?
Nice to meet you! I'm 19 years old and I live down the street from Miley Cyrus and PNB Rock.
Wow, that's so cool! I'm 8 years old and I just moved to the US from France last year.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit France.
It's a really beautiful country. I miss it a lot, but I'm starting to make friends here in the US.
That's great! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, draw, and read.
Me too! I love to play soccer too. I'm on a team here in the US.
That's so cool! I hope to join a team soon.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will!
What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is Asterix.
I've heard of that book! It's supposed to be really good.
It is! I love the stories and the characters.
I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm sure I'll like it.
You're welcome!
